net.sf.sprockets.database

Class EasyCursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.CursorWrapper
      • net.sf.sprockets.database.EasyCursor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cursor, Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReadCursor

    public class EasyCursor
extends CursorWrapper
    Cursor with additional methods that can simplify interaction.

    • Method Detail

      • getBlob

        public byte[] getBlob(String columnName)
        Returns the value of the requested column as a byte array.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the column does not exist

      • getString

        public String getString(String columnName)
        Returns the value of the requested column as a String.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the column does not exist

      • copyStringToBuffer

        public void copyStringToBuffer(String columnName,
                      CharArrayBuffer buffer)
        Retrieves the requested column text and stores it in the buffer provided. If the buffer size is not sufficient, a new char buffer will be allocated and assigned to CharArrayBuffer.data.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the column does not exist

      • getShort

        public short getShort(String columnName)
        Returns the value of the requested column as a short.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the column does not exist

        Returns the value of the requested column as an int.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the column does not exist

      • getType

        public int getType(String columnName)
        Returns data type of the given column's value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the column does not exist
        See Also:
        CursorWrapper.getType(int)

      • isNull

        public boolean isNull(String columnName)
        Returns true if the value in the indicated column is null.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the column does not exist
